p: Being the primary source of vegetable oil production, the oil palm tree ( Elaeis guineensis) is one of the most critical trees in many tropical countries such as Brazil, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Columbia, and Ecuador [ 13]. PKC is a by-product after oil extraction, which is generally a good source of fat, protein, minerals, and carbohydrate [ 14]. Many studies have been conducted to assess PKC’s feeding value and determine its effects on feeding diets in broiler chicken’s industry. Malaysia is one of the world’s largest palm oil producers with a large amount of readily available PKC. There is a need to use PKC in the poultry industry as a source of protein and energy [ 15]. The main objective of the palm industry is to generate palm oil. PKC derives from the nuts of palm fruits is generated as by-products [ 16].
